content: cheeky heart design by josephine laurin materials terms #3 light woolbox dk double knit magic_ring magic_ring 100 g/3 52 oz | 300 m/328 0 yds chain chain baby pink 46 single_crochet single_crochet increase increase 2 5 mm crochet hook decrease decrease i use invisible decrease in my embroidery thread - black work look at description on page 2 stitch marker fo fasten_off darning needle … all stitches inside these brackets goes into the polyester filling same stitch a pair of scissors … repeat the instruction inside these brackets the given number of times … total number of stitches on the end of the language round | english - us terminology | contact pinktomatocrochet@gmail com size instagram com/pinktomatocrochet 4 cm 1 5 inch facebook com/pinktomatocrochet pinktomatocrochet/etsy com ravelry com/stores/anna-josephine-laurin-designs ©2 022 pinktomatocrochet all rights reserved do not redistribute translate sell alter or edit this pattern cheeky heart page 2 pattern notes sponsored yarn used can be bought at www woolboxyarns com this pattern is worked in rounds if nothing else is said this pattern is worked with yarn under single_crochet insert your hook under the top two loops yarn under pull up a loop yarn over and pull through both loops this creates an x stitch i use invisible decrease in my work see instructions below 1 insert your hook in the flo of the next 2 stitches 2 yarn over and pull through 2 of the 3 loops on your hook 3 yarn over and pull through both loops on your hook ©2 022 pinktomatocrochet all rights reserved do not redistribute translate sell alter or edit this pattern cheeky heart page 3 heart details with pink yarn with black embroidery thread embroider 2 stuff as you go black eyes and a small mouth round 1 6 single_crochet in magic_ring 6 round 2 increase x6 12 round 3 1 single_crochet increase x6 18 rounds 4-5 18 single_crochet 2 rounds 18 cut the yarn and do another part of rounds 1-5 do not cut the yarn after you made the second part keep working on round 6 round 6 9 single_crochet connect the first part you made by working a single_crochet in it work 17 more single_crochet in part 1 9 single_crochet in part 2 36 round 7 7 single_crochet decrease x4 32 round 8 3 single_crochet decrease 6 single_crochet decrease x3 3 single_crochet 28 round 9 5 single_crochet decrease x4 24 round 10 6 single_crochet decrease x3 21 round 11 5 single_crochet decrease x3 18 round 12 18 single_crochet 18 round 13 1 single_crochet decrease x6 12 round 14 decrease x6 6 cut the yarn close the hole and fasten_off ©2 022 pinktomatocrochet all rights reserved do not redistribute translate sell alter or edit this pattern cheeky heart page 4 you have now finished your cheeky heart this pattern is an original design by josephine laurin and is for personal use only do not redistribute translate sell or edit this pattern you may sell items made from this pattern but please
